name: Google API Key
description: Detects exposed Google API keys which begin with 'AIza'.

name: AWS Access Key
description: Detects AWS Access Keys typically used for programmatic AWS access.

name: Stripe Live Secret Key
description: Detects Stripe live secret keys (begin with sk_live_).

name: JWT Token
description: Detects JSON Web Tokens (JWT) that may be embedded or hardcoded.

name: Generic Password Pattern
description: Detects strings that look like passwords or credentials.

name: Slack Token
description: Detects Slack Bot/User tokens that begin with xoxb-, xoxp-, etc.

name: Private Key Snippet
description: Detects any embedded private key material that should not be hardcoded.

name: Database Connection String
description: Detects potential hardcoded database URLs or credentials.

name: Auth Token Keyword
description: Detects variables or values that likely represent authorization tokens.

name: Firebase Config Key
description: Detects Firebase API keys that are commonly exposed in mobile apps.

name: GitLab Personal Access Token
description: Detects GitLab Personal Access Tokens that begin with glpat-.
